title: WaveSpeed AI - Seamlessly Join Your Videos Together

prompt.heading: Prompt

upload.heading: Select video clips or Input URLs

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Our innovative AI technology simplifies video editing without compromising quality.

items.title: Instant Video Merging
items.description: Join clips together in seconds without the hassle of complicated software.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No editing experience needed. Simply upload your clips and let our AI do the magic.

items.title: Secure Processing
items.description: Your videos are processed safely in your browser, ensuring your content remains private.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three easy steps to join your videos

items.title: Upload Clips
items.description: Drag and drop or browse your video files. Supported formats include MP4, AVI, and MOV.

items.title: AI Processing
items.description: Our technology intelligently merges the clips while ensuring a smooth flow and high quality.

items.title: Download Final Video
items.description: Preview the joined video and download your seamless creation in high resolution.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless happy users transforming their videos with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Roberts
items.comment: This tool is a lifesaver! Joining clips for my vlogs has never been easier.

items.name: David Kim
items.comment: I love how quickly I can create highlight reels. It’s faster than any software I've used.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Video Joiner

items.title: What video formats can I join?
items.description: You can join various formats such as MP4, AVI, and MOV. The tool automatically handles the conversion if needed.

items.title: Is the service free to use?
items.description: Yes! Users can enjoy 30 free credits each day to join videos. Additional credits can be earned through activities or our subscription plan offers extra features.

items.title: Can I use my joined videos commercially?
items.description: Yes, users on paid plans can use the output for commercial projects. Free-tier users can only use generated content for personal use.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All video processing occurs directly in your browser. No videos are uploaded or stored on our servers, ensuring your data remains confidential.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Stunning Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience the simplicity of video joining. No sign-up required.
